title: Limbo v1.3 Android
description:
== About the game:

Uncertain of his sister's fate, a boy enters LIMBO.
Guide a boy through dark locations full of many traps and deadly hazards. Find a safe path for the hero. The protagonist of this Android game is a boy who goes searching for his missing sister. He finds himself in limbo. The boy is surrounded by dark scenery and scary creatures like giant spiders. Guide your hero through gloomy forests, the ghost town, and other locations. Jump over obstacles, jump onto platforms, avoid monsters, and find hero's sister.

== Features:

Original minimalistic graphics
Great sound
Interesting levels
Absorbing gameplay


== Version:

Limbo v1.3 from March 2, 2015
Full Release


== Version changes:

- Fixed crash on start on some devices with some custom ROMs


== Instructions:

Depending on your device copy one .apk file to your Android 
Run and install it
Unzip limbo.full.zip with a compression software (like 7-Zip link below) copy folder "com.playdead.limbo.full" to SDCARD/ANDROID/OBB
If OBB doesn't exist create it in your Android in the root directory (main system directory)
Play & enjoy!


== System Requirements:

Android 4.3 and up

Download 7-Zip http://www.7-zip.org/download.html

 If you enjoyed the game then share with others by seeding! Or better yet 
support game development and BUY IT!

Game made by 
Playdead
